text: <@UK1BNFHFV> In general for tirelessly helping people with Makie and in particular for the resizing of CairoMakie SVG in VSCode julia plot pane. That was a most pleasant surprise.

elements.text: In general for tirelessly helping people with Makie and in particular for the resizing of CairoMakie SVG in VSCode julia plot pane. That was a most pleasant surprise.

text: Thank you, the SVG size in VSCode had bothered me for months before I finally attempted to fix it :)
